function.name: Record_Client_Email
function.description: Records the client's email so that they may be contacted at a later time. Call this function when the client has given you their email and company name. If a company name is not given, pass 'Unknown' as the second argument. Returns True if successful, False if not.

function.name: Unanswerable_Question
function.description: Records a question that cannot be answered. Call this function when you are asked a question that you do not know the answer to and cannot provide examples for. These questions will be stored and reviewed later. Use this function liberally. Returns True if successful, False if not.

question.description: The question that cannot be answered.
